full_version module¶

class full_version.full_version¶

Bases: object

driver()¶
extract_list()¶

This function helps user extract saved products, create new lists, modify list or open product in browser

login()¶

Used for User Login Returns the username and email

scrape(prod)¶

calls the scraper function from scraper.py

search_fn()¶

Function searches for a given product and returns full list of products scraped. It then gives the user and option to save an item or open an item in browser
